about.caption: About me
about.about_me: Hello, I am Sami Fakhfakh I am computer engineer. I am particularly interested in the science of computer science and especially in development and programming, I am good at this field in which I spend hours and hours in front of my screen to enrich my knowledge and to participate in many projects. I consider myself a passionate and innovative. Thanks to the many projects that I accomplished, I was able to develop a spirit of initiative as well as an autonomy and an ease of work in team.
